attributes.additional_details: It's costing too much for normal people to have essential transport for their everyday needs, especially those who have mental health problems that prevent them from using public transport etc
attributes.background: Drop fuel prices down to below £1.50 per litre again

rejection.details:
We can only accept petitions about things the Government or Parliament are directly responsible for.

Decisions about the price charged for motor fuel are a matter for retailers, not the UK Government or Parliament.

You may wish to sign these petitions which call for related actions: 

Remove duty on motor fuel completely: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/613908

Suspend VAT on road fuels to reduce fuel costs: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/610567
